Technique: PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL; ENGRAVED; RELIEF
Name: Terracotta of Isis - Aphrodite
Description: Figurine of Isis - Aphrodite, standing and naked from the waist up. With the hands she supports a basket of fruit which rests on her head. On her forehead is an uraeus. Next to the left leg is an amphora with vertical handles and next to the right leg, a satyr playing the double flute.
